item.title: My FreeBSD Journey
item.author: Kousha.Zanjani@gmail.com (Kousha Zanjani)
item.description:
I’m a GNU/Linux user and I had Arch/Fedora/… distributions for a while. I was passionate about BSDs especially FreeBSD. It has a devil-like logo (Beastie :)) which is cute and I like it. So I decided to share my experience when I installed it on my laptop as the main OS.

After installation, I had a Terminal which is not a good idea when you’re using an OS as your daily/Personal OS, which made me install a GUI. We need root privilege to do some kinds of stuff so instead su command I prefer to use sudo, so I installed it first.
